Title: Oviri
Writer: Henning Carlsen (scenario), Jean-Claude Carrière (scenario), Christopher Hampton (screenplay)
Actors: Donald Sutherland, Max von Sydow, Jean Yanne, Sofie Gråbøl
Plot: This biographical film, based on the life of French artist Paul Gauguin (Donald Sutherland), follows the painter as he returns to Paris after a long stay in Tahiti and must confront his wife, his children, and his former lover.
